Bu oyunun %70i orospu evladı. Nerede orospu çocuğu varsa hepsi burada. Orospu cocukları ban yemez ama siz yersiniz. Öyle sikim sonik bir oyun
this game is only for cheaters :D
Great game even if you are a rager :)
aw man, another game that has been copied, it's just a ripoff of Valorant, I'm so disappointed.

Honestly, CSGO is a great game to play with friends, seeming i bought the game before it was free, on competitive, casual, training with bots and my personal favourite the workshop created maps that many of our fellow peers create if you have not checked the workshop out yet i recommend highly you do so. You don't need a top tier, mid-range or low-end gaming PC to run this game you can even run the game of a laptop.

However, this game is not for the snowflakes of our generation as the competitive side of this game has a consist level of toxicity not from the enemy though nearly half the time from your team mates but again if you cant take it stick to casual game modes. Not only this but i also recommend buying Prime whilst on this game as the valve anti-cheat does ban the cheaters but not during the game so to reduce the chance of hackers and cheaters etc i would buy the prime option but again you can play the game without it but you may not find it as fun.

Thanks for reading my review upon this game - Jackiechan10117
